item.title: Is this how Russia ends?
item.description:
One day, Vladimir Putin will no longer lead Russia. And, according to the writer and journalist Masha Gessen, there may then no longer be a country called Russia to lead. This was one of many startling analyses I heard in my conversation the other day with Gessen, a Moscow-born, New York-based‚Ä¶

URL: https://the.ink/p/is-this-how-russia-ends?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web
